Dating: NAQADA II (not before); NAQADA; NAQADA III (not after)
Name: Cosmetic palette in the form of an antelope
Description: This cometic palette in schist dates from the Naqada II-III Period and takes the form of an antelope. This example carries no features depicting the anatomical details of the animal. In the middle of the upper part of the palette, one can still distinguish a hole for suspension.
